title: Scott Tinley's triathlon training: with Juli Brening
brief_description: Veteran Scott Tinley and top triathlete Juli Brening share their training methods and performance tips drawn from years of experience in this most demanding and complex sport. Together they cover swimming, running, cycling, nutrition, weight training and race day strategy.
